title: Ex-Vice President Mike Pence set to launch US presidential bid
description: US news outlets report that Pence will announce campaign on June 7, setting up fight with former boss Donald Trump.

title: US House of Representatives on track to vote on debt-ceiling deal

title: Ghanaian writer and feminist Ama Ata Aidoo dies at 81
description: She was one of the continent's best-known writers and inspired a generation of younger authors, artists and feminists.

title: How fighting in Sudan’s Darfur could worsen W Africa insecurity

title: What we need now from the leadership of COP28
description: Countless lives can be saved by putting national interests aside and spearheading a fossil fuel phase-out at COP28.
